%Ite Missa Est from Mass XI (Orbis Factor)

%\beginhymn Ite, missa est

\def\dga{\cchar{-7}{\llap{D}e-}}

\def\dgb{\cchar{-7}{o~}}

\def\dgc{\cchar{-7}{\llap{gr}\'a-}}

\def\dgd{\cchar{-7}{\llap{t}i-}}

\def\dge{\cchar{-7}{~as,}}

\setgregorian1
\setclefsymbol1\gregorianCclef
\setclef14
\musicindent14mm
\raisesong3\Internote
\nosolesmescustos
\initiumgregorianum
\znotes\fissum{1pt}\bmolle b\en
\musicinitial{I.}{I}%
\sgn {}-{}\dga\pes ab\egn
\sgn te,\dgb\clivis aN\clivis aK\augmentumduplex bL\egn
\spatium
\divisiominima
\spatium
\sgn m{i}{s-}\dgc\Salicus MNa\nonspatium\climacus baN\climacus MLK\egn
\sgn sa{}\dgd\pes JK\egn
\spatium
\sgn {}e{st.}\dge\punctum K\augmentum L\egn
\spatium
\Finisgregoriana

\medskip


{\hskip35mm \it \s V. Go now, the Mass is ended.}

{\hskip35mm \it \s R. Thanks be to God.}


\bigskip


\setgregorian1
\setclefsymbol1\gregorianCclef
\setclef14
\musicindent14mm
\raisesong3\Internote
\nosolesmescustos
\initiumgregorianum
\znotes\fissum{1pt}\bmolle b\en
\musicinitial{I.}{B}%
\sgn {}En\pes ab\egn
\sgn {}ed\punctum a\egn
\sgn {}ic\punctum N\egn
\sgn {}{\'a}m\punctum a\augmentum b\egn
\sgn {}us\punctum K\augmentum L\egn
\spatium
\divisiominima
\spatium
\sgn {D}{\'o}-\Salicus MNa\nonspatium\climacus baN\nonspatium\climacus MLK\egn
\sgn mi{n}\pes JK\egn
\sgn {}o{.}\punctum K\augmentum L\egn
\spatium
\Finisgregoriana

\medskip


{\hskip35mm \it \s V. Let us bless the Lord.}
